## Framework.debug() method

Log and display a debug message.

Signature:

```typescript
debug(...messages: any[]): void;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type    | Description |
| --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| messages  | any\[\] |             |

Returns:

void

## Remarks

This error is fatal and will kill the process
